page.title: 21Langford Budville
page.content:
Langford Budville is a village and civil parish with a population of about 473.

It has a few basic facilities; like most villages it has a church (St Peter's), a public house (The Martlet), and a school (Langford Budville) There is also a hotel (Bindon House). It has a new estate which was built in 2009 replacing the central farm by the Martlett, it also has quite a few little fields surrounding it. The village green is used for football and running. The village has one farm, opposite the little estate near by. Langford Budville is about 3 miles from the nearest town which is Wellington. The common thats there joins up with nearly all the villages around. There are bus services to Wellington and Wiveliscombe.
